  "explanation": "The purpose directly relevant to supporting a GDPR / AVG compliant cookie consent system is 'Legal Compliance' (row 11). This is because GDPR compliance involves processing data to fulfill legal obligations. The explanation for this purpose specifically mentions maintaining consent records, which is a crucial aspect of a compliant cookie consent system. Other relevant purposes that may support a GDPR / AVG compliant cookie consent system in an indirect manner can include 'Enforce Access Control' (row 64) and 'Record Management' (row 37).",

```
